details.sectionContent: This workshop will be conducted as a seminar wherein the students will be taught about a Bluetooth speaker with some technical interaction and also will be given a brief about the components and how to design its PCB.
Interesting and innovative workshop in which participants will be taught to make Bluetooth speakers and participants will also taught PCB design prior to the basic like soldering.

What will you learn from this workshop:
	How to design PCB
	Brief about a Bluetooth speaker and its components
	How to do soldering
	Troubleshooting.
Students Will be given a Take Away Kit
